Location: Cincinnati, OH

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Analyst, Information Technology, Research

Description:
This inclusive employer is a member of myGwork – the largest global platform for the LGBTQ+ business community.

 Travel Percentage : 0%

Job Description

Are you ready to unleash your full potential? We’re looking for people who are passionate about payments to chart Worldpay’s path to being the largest and most-loved payments company in the world.

About The Role

As a Risk Analyst, you’ll work on the cutting edge with the largest FinTech company in the world. While using your advanced technical skills to protect Worldpay from threats, you will partner with business leaders to identify risks, evaluate the effectiveness of controls, and promote continuous improvement.

What You Will Be Doing

What You Will Need

What We Offer You

Recruitment at FIS works primarily on a direct sourcing model; a relatively small portion of our hiring is through recruitment agencies.
